entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:02 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
